structuredData.name: Terms & Conditions
structuredData.description: Terms and conditions for Royal Transfer EU premium airport transfer services

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: Welcome to Royal Transfer EU. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our website and services. By accessing our website or using our transportation services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully.
introduction.paragraph2: In these Terms and Conditions, "Royal Transfer EU", "we", "us" and "our" refers to Royal Transfer EU and "you" and "your" refers to you, the client, visitor, website user or person using our services.

booking.title: 2. Booking and Reservations
booking.point1: 2.1. All bookings made through our website, by telephone, or via email constitute acceptance of these Terms and Conditions.
booking.point2: 2.2. Upon completion of your booking, you will receive a confirmation email containing your booking reference number. Please check that the details are correct and contact us immediately if any adjustments are needed.
booking.point3: 2.3. For all bookings, the lead passenger is responsible for ensuring that all passenger information is accurate and complete.
booking.point4: 2.4. We reserve the right to refuse a booking without giving any reason.

pricing.title: 3. Pricing and Payment
pricing.point1: 3.1. All prices shown on our website are in Euros (€) and include applicable taxes unless otherwise stated.
pricing.point2: 3.2. Payment for services can be made by credit/debit card at the time of booking through our secure payment system, or in cash to the driver upon completion of service.
pricing.point3: 3.3. If paying by cash, payment must be made in Euros (€).
pricing.point4: 3.4. Additional charges may apply for specific services such as:
additionalCharges: Waiting time beyond the allocated free waiting time
Additional stops not specified in the original booking
Changes to the route requested during the journey
Special equipment requests made at the time of service
pricing.point5: 3.5. Our prices are guaranteed at the time of booking. Any changes to the booking may result in price adjustments.

cancellations.title: 4. Cancellations and Amendments
cancellations.point1: 4.1. Cancellations must be made in writing by email to support@royaltransfereu.com or through our customer portal.
cancellations.point2: 4.2. Our cancellation policy is as follows:
policy: Cancellations made more than 24 hours before the scheduled pickup time will receive a full refund.
Cancellations made between 12-24 hours before the scheduled pickup time will incur a 50% charge.
Cancellations made less than 12 hours before the scheduled pickup time or no-shows will incur a 100% charge.
cancellations.point3: 4.3. Amendments to bookings can be made up to 4 hours before the scheduled pickup time, subject to availability. Changes made less than 4 hours before the scheduled pickup time cannot be guaranteed and may be treated as a cancellation and rebooking.

airport.title: 5. Airport Pickups and Delays
airport.point1: 5.1. For airport pickups, we monitor flight arrivals and adjust pickup times in the event of flight delays at no extra cost.
airport.point2: 5.2. We provide a free waiting time of:
waitingTime: 45 minutes after scheduled landing time for international flights
30 minutes after scheduled landing time for domestic flights
15 minutes for all other pickup locations
airport.point3: 5.3. Additional waiting time beyond these periods will be charged at our standard hourly rates.

service.title: 6. Service Standards and Limitations
service.point1: 6.1. We are committed to providing high-quality transportation services with professional drivers and well-maintained vehicles.
service.point2: 6.2. While we make every effort to ensure punctuality, we cannot accept liability for delays caused by factors beyond our control such as traffic conditions, weather, or force majeure events.
service.point3: 6.3. The maximum number of passengers and luggage items per vehicle is limited by the vehicle type and must be adhered to for safety and comfort reasons.
service.point4: 6.4. Royal Transfer EU reserves the right to refuse transportation to any person who is thought to be under the influence of alcohol or drugs, or whose behavior is considered dangerous or offensive.

liability.title: 7. Liability
liability.point1: 7.1. Royal Transfer EU is insured for public liability and passenger liability as required by law.
liability.point2: 7.2. We accept no liability for any loss, damage, or inconvenience caused as a result of a booking not being honored due to circumstances beyond our control.
liability.point3: 7.3. Royal Transfer EU is not liable for any indirect or consequential losses, including but not limited to missed flights or connections, loss of earnings, or business opportunities.
liability.point4: 7.4. Our maximum liability to you for any loss or damage arising from a booking shall be limited to the total value of that booking.

belongings.title: 8. Personal Belongings
belongings.point1: 8.1. Passengers are responsible for their personal belongings. Royal Transfer EU and its drivers will not be held responsible for any items left in the vehicle after the completion of the service.
belongings.point2: 8.2. If items are found, we will make reasonable efforts to return them to their owners, but cannot guarantee their recovery or condition.

dataProtection.title: 9. Data Protection and Privacy
dataProtection.point1: 9.1. Royal Transfer EU is committed to protecting your privacy. Our Privacy Policy, which is available on our website, explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
dataProtection.point2: 9.2. By making a booking with us, you consent to the collection, processing, and transfer of your personal information as set out in our Privacy Policy.

intellectualProperty.title: 10. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.point1: 10.1. All content on the Royal Transfer EU website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Royal Transfer EU or its content suppliers and is protected by international copyright laws.
intellectualProperty.point2: 10.2. You may not reproduce, distribute, or use any content from our website without our express written permission.

governingLaw.title: 11. Governing Law
governingLaw.point1: 11.1. These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Italy.
governingLaw.point2: 11.2. Any disputes arising under these Terms and Conditions shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Italy.

modifications.title: 12. Modifications to Terms
modifications.point1: 12.1. Royal Transfer EU reserves the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Any changes will be posted on our website and will be effective immediately upon posting.
modifications.point2: 12.2. It is your responsibility to review these Terms and Conditions periodically for changes. Your continued use of our services following the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of those changes.
